input.sentences: the family enjoyed a nice bike ride down the pier to start their vacation ...
and | they continued down the road for several more miles..
before stopping at another pier and another view of the beach .
they finished up the day with dinner at a nice restaurant..
and | a beautiful view of the harbor .
output.sentences: We stopped to admire the view from our bikes.
The trail was lovely and green.
My friends posed for pictures at every stop.
We enjoyed dinner along the way.
My favorite trails are always by the water.
